alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 11:41PM CDT until August 03 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTHERN MARATHON AND WESTERN LANGLADE COUNTIES... At 1141 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Headwaters Wilderness to 11 miles northeast of Parrish to 7 miles east of Dutch Corners to 7 miles northwest of Wausau, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Antigo, Merrill, Rib Mountain, Harrison, Parrish, Council Grounds State Park, Dutch Corners, Veterans Memorial County Park and Elcho. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
